#summary R_cardExtensionalSet( | {t1,...,tn} | )
R_cardExtensionalSet( | {t,,1,,,...,t,,n,,} | ) - ([http://code.google.com/p/aic-expresso/source/browse/trunk/src/main/java/com/sri/ai/grinder/library/equality/cardinality/direct/core/CardinalityExtensionalSet.java implementation])
<pre>
inputs: Each ti is an expression.
return: a basic expression equivalent to | {t1,...,tn} |.
</pre>
| `if n = 0` // empty set<br>
|.... `return 0`<br>
| // cardinality of the set expression without the first element expression<br>
| `N <- `[RewriterCardExtensionalSet R_cardExtensionalSet]`( | {t`,,2,,`,...,t`,,k,,`} | )`<br>
| `Irrelevant <- `[RewriterSimplify R_simplify]`(t`,,1,,` = t`,,2,,` or ... or t`,,1,,` = t`,,n,,`)`<br>
| `return if Irrelevant then N else `[FunctionPlusOne plusOne]`(N)`<br>
